title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Science Learning Through Library Automation Systems and E-Book Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Proficiency and Experience in Searching Science Library Resources
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Students can search for science-related materials within 10 minutes using an automated library system.
Students can analyze the advantages of e-books and explain methods for applying them to science learning.
Students can propose user experience improvements for automated library systems through field observations and interviews.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
